txt_en: This universe is not outside of you. Look inside yourself; everything that you want, you already are.
txt_cn: 宇宙并不在你之外。看看自己的内心吧。你想要的一切，都已尽在你身。
author: Rumi

txt_en: Life isn't about finding yourself. Life is about creating yourself.
txt_cn: 生命的意义不在于发现你自己，而在于创造你自己。
author: George Bernard Shaw

txt_en: We are young. So let's set the world on fire. We can burn brighter than the sun.
txt_cn: 我们是青年，让我们点亮世界，释放生命，胜过太阳。
author: Fun., "We Are Young"

txt_en: If there's one thing to be taught, it's dreams are made to be caught.
txt_cn: 唯有一事值得谨记，有梦想就要奋力追逐。
author: Gavin Degraw, "Fire"

txt_en: We're losing all this daylight but soon the moon's gonna rise.
txt_cn: 虽然白日将尽，但有一轮新月正冉冉高升。
author: Young Rising Sons, “Turnin'”
